scripts.compile: pnpm clean && pnpm compile:fa2-plus && pnpm compile:swap-recipe-mint && pnpm compile:ntt-transfer-hook
scripts.compile:fa2-plus: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/main/fa2-plus.ligo -e fa2_plus_main > ./build/contracts/fa2-plus.tz
scripts.compile:swap-recipe-mint: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/main/swap-recipe-mint.ligo -e main > ./build/contracts/swap-recipe-mint.tz
scripts.compile:ntt-transfer-hook: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/main/ntt-transfer-hook.ligo -e main > ./build/contracts/ntt-transfer-hook.tz
